scripts.dev: npm run _ -- cross-env INPUT_BOMFILEPATH="./test-sbom-example.json" INPUT_BOMOUTPUT="cyclonedx-json" node index.js
scripts.dev:syft-spdx: npm run _syft -- cross-env INPUT_BOMNAME="manifest-github-action@dev-syft-spdx" INPUT_BOMOUTPUT="spdx-json" node index.js
scripts.dev:syft-cdx: npm run _syft -- cross-env INPUT_BOMNAME="manifest-github-action@dev-syft-cdx" INPUT_BOMOUTPUT="cyclonedx-json" node index.js
scripts.dev:trivy-spdx: npm run _trivy -- cross-env INPUT_BOMNAME="manifest-github-action@dev-trivy-spdx" INPUT_BOMOUTPUT="spdx-json" node index.js
scripts.dev:trivy-cdx: npm run _trivy -- cross-env INPUT_BOMNAME="manifest-github-action@dev-trivy-cdx" INPUT_BOMOUTPUT="cyclonedx-json" node index.js
